text: Paul Sueo Hamaguchi (1 August 1948 - 28 December 2020) was a Japanese Roman Catholic bishop. Hamaguchi was born in Oita, Japan. He became a priest in 1975. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Oita, Japan, from 2011 until his death. Hamaguchi died on 28 December 2020 at the age of 72.Diocese of Oita ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from ÅŒita Prefecture Category:Roman Catholic bishops
title: Paul Sueo Hamaguchi
